forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hum of night begins to yield to the dawn, Downtown San Francisco awakens beneath a clear expanse of sky, a canvas of deep indigo slowly warming to hints of amber. The air is crisp, an invigorating chill that suggests the promise of a pleasantly sunny day ahead. With temperatures dancing around the mid-fifties as the hour creeps past midnight, one might feel just a breath of coolness on the skin—perfectly set on the cusp of something vibrant. The gentle northwest winds, brushing through at a modest ten miles per hour, bring a buoyancy to the atmosphere, stirring a soft rustle among the leaves.

Expect the sunshine to take center stage as the day unfolds, lifting the spirits and brightening the streets to a pleasantly warm high near seventy-four. The morning will greet you with warmth, only to gently recede in the afternoon, settling around seventy-two—a gradual shift that encourages layering. Whether you opt for a light sweater or a casual jacket, the morning coolness and the afternoon heat provide a perfect balance for a leisurely stroll through the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to a local café. No fog to cloak the city today, no lingering marine layer stealing visibility; just the joyful clarity of a day promising exploration. Perhaps a quiet walk along the waterfront as the sun glimmers on the bay, or simply indulging in a book at a sun-kissed terrace, all here beckoning you to embrace a day full of potential in this vibrant urban landscape.
